blog.name: Github
blog.shortdescription: Github is actually a development platform based on git which is a distributed version-control system. However, they added a fitur that allows users to build their own webpage. Building here helps to learn best practice of backing up your own contents because the process is that you have build your content locally initially which then uploaded to your Github webpage repository using git. On other free blogs, I once have one deleted because I forgot to extend and since I don't have backup of the data, it's lost forever.
